Package com.futuresailors.battleships.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Controller
    Implemented by the controllers and used so a single Listener can be used across each of the panels/controllers and call the appropriate methods.
    GameTypeController
    An interface that will be used by the controllers that allow the game to be started.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameTypeMenuController
    Controller to choose game type.
    MainMenuController
    The Main/First Game Controller which creates & sets up the JFrame Window.
    MultiPlayerController
    This controller sets up the server and client connection to allow networked multiplayer to take place.
    PlaceShipsController
    This controller adds a PlaceShipsPanel to the window and is used to allow users to choose the tiles they wish to place their ships in.
    ReloadedMapSelectionController
    Controller for reloaded map selection.
    ReloadedModeController
    Controller for reloaded.
    RulesController
    Displays the rules to the user from the rules.html resource.
    SinglePlayerController
    Controller for the main game in single player mode.
